p.span:
Sonora ISD recognizes the complex challenge of empowering students to succeed in a world of rapid change and is committed to meeting the ever-changing demands of 21st-century education. We are a family, a community, a team; we dedicate ourselves and our resources to provide every child with every opportunity to become more tomorrow than can be imagined today.
​

div.div: Graduation pictures have been scheduled for May 6th and 7th. Click here for schedule and other important details.
This week, April 28th-30th, the Sonora field house will be open for equipment turn-in and locker clean out for all sports.Click here for additional information.
Sonora ISD is actively monitoring the coronavirus situation. Please click here for information and updates.
